title: Dias
body: This family name is very ancient among us. One of the first to use it on this island was Rui Dias de Aguiar, son of Diogo de Aguiar and grandson of Zarco. See Aguiar.

Rui Dias de Aguiar: One of the first to use the surname Dias on this island, son of Diogo de Aguiar and grandson of Zarco
